body.name: Mini Projector with 5G WiFi and Bluetooth W/ Tripod & Bag, ALVAR 9000 Lumens Portable Outdoor Movie Projector 240" Display & 1080P Supported, Compatible with TV Stick/HDMI/VGA/USB/iOS & Android
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 43 mins
features: 🌐 【2023 Upgraded Bluetooth 5.1 and Hi-Fi Stereo Speaker】 ALVAR Bluetooth Projector has a built-in stereo surround speaker which provides the original audio fidelity. You can also connect it with Bluetooth headsets, Bluetooth speakers, and other Bluetooth devices as you want. Do1by sound is not supported. If there is no sound when playing videos, please turn off Do1by sound on your connected devices or apps (Setting>Display & Sounds>Audio>Do1by Digital Output>Turn off Do1by Digital Plus)

🌐【5G & 2.4G WiFi Screen Mirroring】 5G and 2.4G mirroring modes. 5G bandwidth can be increased to 40MHz or even 80MHz, and the transmission speed is up to 1Gbps, which can transmit about 125MB content per second. You can instantly mirror the movies on your phone to the projector in one second with no extra adapters and dongles. NOTE: Due to copyright issues Netflix / Amazon are prohibited from playing movies. You can connect the projector with the TV Stick to watch Netflix or other videos.

🌐 【Tripod and Carrying Case Included】 ALVAR WiFi projector comes with a bag, which is easy to take out for parties and outings with your friends. Tripod also makes it easier to secure the projector in your home. It can be placed on any table and is very simple to install. The projector also has screw holes for mounting upside down on the roof.

🌐【Connect to Compatible Devices】 The Mini projector is equipped with multiple ports, including HDMI, VGA, AV, USB, TF, and 3.5mm Audio-out. Compatible with TV Stick, Chromecast, X-Box ONE, PC, laptops, Tablet, DVD player, USB drives, external speakers, iOS device, Android smartphone, etc. Perfect for playing videos, sports events, TV shows, and sharing photos.

🌐 【9000 Lumens & Professional Lifetime Technical Support】ALVAR video projector provides sharp and detailed images for indoor and outdoor with 9000L, 4:3 aspect ratio and 10000:1 high contrast. Lifetime technical support for projectors. Please feel free to contact our professional support team for any question or concern.

Faster 5G WiFi Connection For iOS System The network environment will affect your mirroring, please keep the projector in a fluency WiFi environment For Android System Copyrighted content from Netflix, Hulu and similar services can not be mirrored or screencast.

Why can't I mirror/cast Netflix, Hulu, or Amazon Prime videos? Due to the HDCP protocol, our projectors do not support streaming videos from Netflix, Hulu, or Amazon Prime, over the phone. Instead, you can connect Amazon Fire TV Stick or a Google Chromecast to the projector to stream videos. Why is there no sound when I play videos via Chromecast, Roku, or Fire TV stick on my projector? Please go to the Sound Settings of your TV stick and select Auto Detect or PCM. After setting, the projector will be able to decode the audio from the stick. How to avoid audio lag when using Bluetooth? In order to get rid of the lag, we suggest you mirror your device to the projector via a wired connection. Additionally, please move your Bluetooth device closer to the projector in order to minimize interference in the environment. Why is my projector out of focus and blurry? Please adjust the focus ring and keystone ring to try to optimize image quality. Try to adjust the projection size from 60" to 120" based on the distance between the projector and the screen. Why is there no response when I use the remote control? The remote control does not come with batteries, so please prepare two AAA batteries on your own and install them into the remote. Point the remote at the IR receiver on the back of the projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent projector for this price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm a club events DJ and I always like having a video element when possible. As so many venues don't have their own setup, I bought this to basically always have my own, portable option. And I have to say, it is everything it's advertised to be: small and lightweight, easy to use, great functionality, and really great picture!Even using it on darker walls or surfaces not mean for projection (see my video), it's nice and bright and clear. Plus, the carrying case, tripod, and remote is an extra bonus. So I highly recommend this projector, especially for it's price. It's a great deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed, and compact
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this projector to use for showing videos and presentations off of our laptop computer at work meetings, and I was surprised at how small the projector was when it arrived! It fits easily in my backpack with everything else. It will work well for traveling, and my son watched a movie on it last week, and the picture was responsive and quick and the contrast and brightness made it enjoyable to watch.The picture quality is amazing: crisp, responsive, bright, great contrast. It works best on a projector screen, but even on a bumpy wall, people can read even the smallest words from the back of the room.It comes with a stand, which is a nice addition I’ve not had with other projectors. It makes it so easy to adjust where the picture is on the wall or screen.The projector is quiet, which is so nice and unexpected based on my experience with other projectors. It also stays cool so I haven’t worried about it overheating or anything, but I’ve not used it for more than a couple hours at a time.The remote works well. You do have to provide your own AAA batteries. I’ve not used the wifi or anything other than the included hdmi cord, but hdmi worked perfectly well and the cord seems like good quality.I was a little worried this would be a cheap knock-off at the price I got it for, but I’m really impressed and will probably get another one for our other office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's not great, but it's ok..
reviews.reviewText: If 60 bucks is what you want to spend then this is probably as good as you're going to do and it works good, the picture is pretty good up to about 100" diag. The sound is totally audible but not.. you know, it's a 2" speaker..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well. I use this for an emergency backup when I have to do presentations or as a loan to other presenters when our club has more than one presenter. It has a very nice picture. It is a nice size for carrying around and has a nice case to keep it and its parts in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and good picture quality.
reviews.reviewText: The projector is very clear! It arrived quickly, was very easy to set up, and worked perfectly for the presentation we used to play videos for the family. This has been an amazing value for the price. I have had no issues, and it comes with accessories (HDMI, remote, and a nice travel bag). We are very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comes in clear. Good quality. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not blown away, but satisfied.
reviews.reviewText: Could not for the life of me get streaming to work properly when I used HDMI to Lightning. However, worked seemlessly with roku device.Overall, nice and cheap projectors. Doesn't have all the bells and whistles, but it serves it's purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s pretty good!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The projector has a good quality display, I can even see it when it’s bright outside. The audio is great it gets pretty loud. Expect to hear a humming sound but it’s not hard to ignore, kinda like a white noise. I wasn’t able to connect my screen mirror through my iPhone to it which was unfortunate, but I’m buying a fire stick for it anyway. Hooking it through a computer works great for now. Overall good buy!
I like this mini projector the remote control is good and the brightness and picture quality is incredible. I love this very much worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: The picture quality is better than I expected!
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is much better than I expected and the colors are bright and clear. To get the best picture quality, you should position the projector at a 90-degree angle (zero keystone correction) to the screen. That's why I mounted it to the ceiling. It provides acceptable use during the day with the curtains closed. This projector works well with the Amazon fire stick. The speakers aren't very good, but it doesn't matter as I get a good sound with a Bluetooth headset. The remote control is simple but usable. My children also loved the product. Highly recommend this projector.Will probably upgrade to a better screen at some point but overall great quality for the price

reviews.reviewTitle: No se puede vincular con el celular ni con la computadora.
reviews.reviewText: No se puede vincular con El celular ni con la computadora

5 out of 5 Stars (4.6)⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐[TL;DR][QUALITY] (5/5)[VALUE] (5/5)[EASE OF USE] (4/5)[MET EXPECTATIONS] (4/5)[PACKAGING] (5/5)[REVIEW REMARKS]I am impressed by this entry level projector (B0BKL51JQ5). At the time of ordering, the price was $89.99. This is a decent value for the projector you are receiving.This is not a TV replacement, by any stretch. It is also not home theatre quality. With that said, this is a great budget projector to use when you would like to project a movie or video, play a video game console, or watch something from a USB drive. This projector does not perform well with text, so using it for Word, Excel, or PowerPoint is not advised.The specifications on the seller's description differ from the specifications of this unit. The seller claims that this is 1080P, while that may be true by being able to play from 1080P sources, the included manual states that the resolution is 1920x720. This is 720P, not 1080P. Although, this is still considered HD, it is low-end HD. If this is not a concern, then it is what it is.This projector comes well packed in a box that could be used for storing the unit when not in use, or to take with you. Inside the box is the projector, lens cap, HDMI cable, mini tripod, remote (2AAA batteries not included), cleaning kit, manuals, and power cable.The quality does match the price point, so the value is present. This projector is under $100, therefore it is considered an entry point, low end projector. If you are not sure about a projector, or how it could fit in your mix, this might be a great starter option.One thing I noticed after testing and I was writing up the review, the ASIN on the reviewed version is B0BKL51JQ5 and the page displays a different model all together, complete with a carry bag. I did not receive a bag. It also says it is 9000 lumens, my version is 7500 lumens. The ASIN linked to this now is B0B6VF57MK.-- BUYER BEWARE. --This is a different projector than what I was sent. It is also more expensive.All-in-all, good entry level. Excellent price point. Make sure the specs match up with the unit you are ordering. I am a little disappointed that this review is not being posted to the correct product.In the event that experiences change or evolve, updates may be made to this review to address such developments.

Great little projector at a low cost. Came in a nice bag, with accessories and lens cleaning kit. Setup was easy & connects to screen mirroring quickly. Ive hung mine from the ceiling and at about 8 feet from the wall it projects a 120" image. Picture quality is better than expected and volume/sound quality is satisfactory for a bedroom. Im really pleased with the projector and for the price I have to give it 5 stars.
